glave_pomimo_povsednevnykh_zatrat_v_zhiz: In this chapter, in addition to everyday expenses, emergencies occur in life. In this game such emergencies are diseases of kittens. If sick kittens are not treated, they will run away at the end of the season.
smotri_u_kotenka_bolit_lapka_davai_prove: Look, the kitten’s paw hurts. Let’s check what happens if we sell a sick kitten. Close the magnifier and go to the pet shop.
posle_togo_kak_ty_nashel_bolnogo_kotenka: After you have found a sick kitten, it will be visible even without the magnifier.
zoomagazin_ne_kupil_bolnogo_kotenka_esli: The pet shop did not buy the sick kitten. If it is not treated, the kitten will run away from you at the end of the season. In the real game, a pet shop player may not notice and buy a sick pet, but will not be able to sell it to anyone. To treat the kitten, return to the cattery.
peretashchi_lupu_na_bolnogo_kotenka: Drag the magnifier onto the sick kitten.
v_igre_mogut_byt_raznye_zabolevaniya_che: There may be different diseases in the game. You will understand how to treat them by the active icon on the magnifier. Bandage the kitten’s paw.
ved_kotyata_zdorovy_i_magaziny_ot_nikh_n: The kittens are now healthy, and shops will not refuse them. Let’s try to sell all the kittens. Close the magnifier and return to the main screen.
v_etoi_glave_my_uznali_kak_lechit_nashik: In this chapter we learned how to treat our kittens. To complete the practical task, look at how we calculated it:
esli_by_u_tebya_zabolelo_dvoe_kotyat_to_: If two of your kittens became ill, you would calculate the cost of treatment like this:
sredi_tvoikh_kotyat_est_bolnye_no_vsekh_: Some of your kittens are sick, but you need to sell them all at the highest price. Good luck!
